name: Force Company, 1st Recon Battalion hike

desc.html: Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, California - Marines with Force Company, 1st Reconnaissance Battalion, 1st Marine Division hike with 50-pound packs and carry a 60-pound container full of sand during a physical training exercise aboard Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, Calif., Nov. 7, 2014. The physical training exercise also incorporated activities to improve proficiency in marksmanship and memorization. Photo by: Cpl Joshua Murray

tags: files from freely licensed external sources
